name: Captain Flamethrower Visits The Children's Hospital (SuitsnNukes)
name_original: Captain Flamethrower Visits The Children's Hospital (SuitsnNukes)
description:
Do you like your children medium, or extra crispy? Or perhaps well done? Captain Flamethrower is on another wacky world-wind adventure, and when this un medicated lunatic stumbles into the local children's hospital, hold onto your sides and prepare for to experience the twisted fun of the depraved!

NOTE: The game is a .swf file and requires flash to work. Look for part 2 available now!
